title: What is a ‘Barefoot Shoe?’ Ronnie Romance Talks Stomp Lox Trail Worm
content:
When we posted the new Stomp Lox Trail Worm shoes Kickstarter last month, there was some confusion about the term, ‘barefoot shoe.’ Well, Ronnie is here to break it all down for ya!

The post What is a ‘Barefoot Shoe?’ Ronnie Romance Talks Stomp Lox Trail Worm appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
